client.server

Class ServerPoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.server.ServerPoller

  • public class ServerPoller
extends java.lang.Object
    Polls the server to check whether a new model exists. If a new model exists, the ServerPoller sends the new data to the Model to update itself. This class runs on its own thread, extends Timer and uses a TimerTask to stay up to date.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ServerPoller.PollTask
      Class to independently manage the polling of the server at regular intervals.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int interval
      The number of seconds at which to poll the server for updates.
      private ModelUpdater modelUpdater
      The class that does all model updates.
      private IServerProxy proxy
      The proxy to use when polling the server.
      private java.util.Timer timer
      The timer to poll the server at regular intervals.
      private int version
      The version of the server since the last poll.

    • Field Detail

      • interval

        private int interval
        The number of seconds at which to poll the server for updates.

      • version

        private int version

        The version of the server since the last poll. Used to check if changes have been made to the server by comparing the version numbers.

      • proxy

        private IServerProxy proxy
        The proxy to use when polling the server. This will be set externally.

      • modelUpdater

        private ModelUpdater modelUpdater
        The class that does all model updates.

      • timer

        private java.util.Timer timer
         The timer to poll the server at regular intervals.
 Will run on it's own thread, independent of the other code.

        public ServerPoller(int seconds,
                    IServerProxy proxy)
        Parameters:
        seconds - The interval at which to poll the server for updates

    • Method Detail

      • pollServer

        private void pollServer()
        Calls the server proxy to retrieve the current model state.
        Precondition:
             1. proxy is not null
     2. version is not null
        Postcondition:
                If the operation succeeds:
                1. A new version of the model is received from the server

 If the operation fails:
                1. The server returns an HTTP 400 error message and the response body contains an error message

      • checkForUpdates

        private boolean checkForUpdates(org.json.simple.JSONObject data)
        Checks if the JSONObject contains updated data.
        Parameters:
        data - The JSONObject to check for new data
        Returns:
        true if the JSONObject contains new data, otherwise false
        Precondition:
        data is not nul

      • updateModel

        private void updateModel(org.json.simple.JSONObject data)
        Sends the new JSON data to the Model so the Model can update itself.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to send to the model so it can update itself
        Precondition:
         data is not null
        Postcondition:
         The model is updated with the new data.
